1370: Ghodelde was born in Die Camp in 1370.
Got married to Rampe at age 14 in 1370.
Gave birth to Heinkin in 1370 at age 14.
1372: Gave birth to Rodolf in 1372 at age 16.
1376: Gave birth to Eltetus in 1376 at age 20.
1377: Lost daughter Hodine when Hodine was 0 years old.

1381: Gave birth to Vais in 1381 at age 25.
1384: Gave birth to Pelegrim in 1384 at age 28.
1386: Lost son Vais when Vais was 6 years old.
1397: Lost son Eltetus when Eltetus was 22 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
